incident_updates.body: Start time : 18/01/2022 14:00 UTC Service impact : Unreachability observed on some hosted websites on Filerz98 Ongoing actions : We are investigating the cause of the problem. We will get back to you as soon as possible. We apologise for any inconvenience caused.

Update: Our teams are working on regenerating the metrics. 30/10/2021 to 16/11/2021 metrics are re-generated. 30/09/2021 to 11/10/2021 mterics are 50% done. 12/01/2022 to 15/01/2022 and 30/11/2021 to 13/12/2021 metrics will be generated shortly.

Ongoing actions :Following some slowness on the filerz, we had to cancel the regeneration spots. They were relaunched this morning but with a smaller gap in stats to regenerate Next update : 17/01/2022
Ongoing actions : The reconstruction of the statistics takes longer than estimated. 36% of the statistics are rebuilt since last Friday Next update max : 17/01/2022
Ongoing actions : The reconstruction of the statistics takes longer than estimated. Today 25% of the statistics are rebuilt since last Friday Next update : 17/01/2022
Start time : 07/01/2022 Service impact : some statistiques between september and december are missing Ongoing actions : We relaunch all statistics generation, this action can take all week-end

Here is a status of the backups in progress : Cluster 20: filerz20 / filerz47 / filerz99 / filerz128/ filerz173 Cluster 23: filerz77 / filerz98 / filerz941 Cluster 26: filerz172 / filerz178 / filerz190 / filerz215/ filerz969 Cluster 27: filerz265 Cluster 28: filerz786 / filerz 942 / filerz947 / filerz958 / filerz962 / filerz964 / filerz979 Cluster 29: filerz934 Cluster 30: filerz1033 / filerz1036

To date, all filerz have rebooted. Here is a status of the backups in progress : Cluster 20: filerz20 / filerz47 / filerz99 / filerz128/ filerz173 Cluster 23: filerz22 / filerz77 / filerz98 / filerz102 / filerz941 Cluster 26: filerz158 / filerz172 / filerz 175 / filerz178 / filerz190 / filerz215 / filerz216 / filerz969 / Cluster 27: filerz251 / filerz265 / filerz288 Cluster 28: filerz631 / filerz786 / filerz 942 / filerz947 / filerz958 / filerz962 / filerz964 / filerz979 / filerz985 Cluster 29: filerz934 Cluster 30: filerz1033 / filerz1036
We schedule a new maintenance operation to treat the remaining filerz. You can follow the operation via this task : https://web-cloud.status-ovhcloud.com/incidents/ndtbmkhp649y

We schedule a new maintenance operation to treat the remaining filerz. You can follow the operation via this task : [GRA][Webhosting] - Filerz 04/01 - 11/01. Filerz on cluster 002/003/005/007 have fully completed their backup

scheduled_maintenances.name: [GRA][Webhosting] - Filerz SSD SATA Data Migration and Service Migration

incident_updates.body: Start time : 18/01/2022 23:00 UTC End time : 01/02/2022 07:00 UTC Service impact : About 30mn downtime per filerz Service improvement : Following several incidents with Filerz delivered in SSD SATA. We need to replace these drives with SAS drives, but we need to transfer the data and service to another filerz with SAS drives. The triple replication automation will synchronise the data between the SATA SSD filerz and the SAS SSD filerz. This change will activate the Disaster Recovery Plan (DRP) action which will migrate the client service from SATA SSD filerz to SAS SSD filerz. This intervention affect 66 filerz. We will do the DRP of 10 servers per night. Intervention will starts at 00:00 AM UTC+1 and stops at 08:00 AM UTC+1. We will do one server at a time. 19/01/2022 : server1577 ClusterID 31 20/01/2022 : server1580 ClusterID 28 server1591 ClusterID 31 21/01/2022 : server1518 ClusterID 30 server1506 ClusterID 22 server1542 ClusterID 30 server1551 ClusterID 30 server1568 ClusterID 30 server1570 ClusterID 29 server1571 ClusterID 30 server1624 ClusterID 29 server1625 ClusterID 29 server1628 ClusterID 31 24/01/2022 : server1632 ClusterID 31 server1637 ClusterID 31 25/01/2022 : server1638 ClusterID 31 server1653 ClusterID 31 server1664 ClusterID 31 server1575 ClusterID 28 server1581 ClusterID 28 server1592 ClusterID 31 server1654 ClusterID 31 server1656 ClusterID 29 server1657 ClusterID 29 server1659 ClusterID 31 26/01/2022 : server1661 ClusterID 31 server1569 ClusterID 28 server1574 ClusterID 30 server1578 ClusterID 31 server1582 ClusterID 28 server1585 ClusterID 29 server1586 ClusterID 28 server1588 ClusterID 31 server1589 ClusterID 31 server1590 ClusterID 31 27/01/2022 : server1593 ClusterID 31 server1594 ClusterID 28 server1508 ClusterID 30 server1595 ClusterID 31 server1510 ClusterID 29 server1511 ClusterID 27 server1512 ClusterID 27 server1514 ClusterID 28 server1543 ClusterID 30 server1545 ClusterID 30 28/01/2022 : server1549 ClusterID 30 server1550 ClusterID 29 server1576 ClusterID 31 server1607 ClusterID 31 server1608 ClusterID 31 server1611 ClusterID 31 server1615 ClusterID 31 server1618 ClusterID 31 server1621 ClusterID 31 server1625 ClusterID 29 31/01/2022 : server1626 ClusterID 29 server1631 ClusterID 31 01/02/2022 : server1641 ClusterID 31 server1600 ClusterID 22 server1655 ClusterID 31 server1710 ClusterID 31
